snippet.title: KOF Days of Memories ~Kare to Watashi no Atsui Natsu~ - Part 1 [ENG/ESP/PT]
snippet.description:
Days of Memories ~Kare to Watashi no Atsui Natsu~ (My Hot Summer with Him)

This is a special request to translate Kyo’s route in Days of Memories. The first video contains the introduction to the main cast.

The game was made available for Nintendo DS in 2008. It is aimed at a female audience and you play as a girl named Makoto Satou, while her best friend Kaori has a supporting role. The available romanceable characters include Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, K’, Ryo Sakazaki, Terry Bogard, Rock Howard, Alba Meira, and Ash Crimson. The supporting cast includes Shingo Yabuki, Billy Kane, Maxima and Krizalid.

Original title: Days of Memories 〜彼と私の熱い夏〜
Translation: Miau (English & Spanish) | Boo (Portuguese)
Requested by Boo. Thank you for your continuous support to the translation projects! ^^

0:00 Makoto & Kaori intro
2:01 Kyo intro
4:18 Terry & Rock intro
07:38 Ash intro
10:01 K' intro
13:50 Ryo intro
16:49 Alba intro
22:42 Kyo & Iori
25:00 Iori vs Makoto + Ryo
28:34 Rock's arrival
33:04 Terry in the park
34:48 A BL fan?
37:29 Iori at the live house
39:55 Alba on the way home
